title: Trading Signal Event
description: Schema for a trading signal generated by the Quantum Consciousness Core.

request_id.description: The ID of the original analysis request.

market.description: The market for which the signal is generated.

confidence.description: A score from 0.0 to 1.0 indicating the model's confidence in the signal.

metadata.description: Additional data, such as the indicator values that led to the signal.
